summary.para: Contains common utility classes used by the Map controls from DevExpress.
Provides data for the MapItemsLayerBase.AttributeDisplayValueEdit and VectorLayerBase.AttributeDisplayValueEdit events.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Map.AttributeDisplayValueEditEventArgs.#ctor(System.String,System.Object,System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified values of event arguments.

member.param: A object representing the name of an attribute.
A object that is the string representation of the attribute value.
A object representing a fragment of a text pattern, which will be replaced with the display value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Map.AttributeDisplayValueEditEventArgs.DisplayValue

summary.para: Gets or sets an attribute display value.

member.value: A object that is the string representation of the attribute value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Map.AttributeDisplayValueEditEventArgs.Name

summary.para: Returns the name of an attribute.

member.value: A object representing the name of attribute whose display value should be customized.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Map.AttributeDisplayValueEditEventArgs.PatternFragment

summary.para: Returns the pattern fragment which will be replaced with the AttributeDisplayValueEditEventArgs.DisplayValue.

member.value: A object representing the fragment pattern.

summary.para: Returns an attribute value.

member.name: T:DevExpress.Map.AttributeDisplayValueEditEventHandler

summary.para: A method that will handle the MapItemsLayerBase.AttributeDisplayValueEdit and VectorLayerBase.AttributeDisplayValueEdit events.

member.param: The event source. This parameter identifies the (WinForms) or (WPF) which raised the event.
